name: Automate Google Analytics data sharing to Google Sheets and Slack
description:
Effortlessly automate the transfer of weekly user and session data from Google Analytics to Google Sheets and share insights directly on Slack. Set to run every Friday at 17:00, you can adjust the timing to fit your teamâ€™s needs for real-time decision making.
The scenario is scheduled to execute every Friday at 17:00 which you can change in the schedule setting by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
